Title: Gadar 2
Plot: When Tara Singh goes missing during a skirmish and is believed to be captured in Pakistan, his son Jeetey sets out to rescue him and enters a labyrinth from which they both must escape at all costs.

Title: OMG 2
Plot: An unhappy civilian asks the court to mandate comprehensive education in schools in a dramatic yet amusing courtroom play.

Title: Ghoomer
Plot: Anina, a young woman batting prodigy, loses her right hand in an unfortunate accident on the eve of her international cricketing debut. An unsympathetic, failed, and frustrated cricketer enters her life, gives her a new dream, and transforms her fate with the most innovative training, making her play for the Indian cricket team again, but this time as a bowler. Ghoomer is the new style of bowling they invent to bamboozle the opposition.

Title: Dream Girl 2
Plot: Karam, who is trying to live a serious life in Mathura and falls in love with Pari but life is hell bent on not taking him seriously. In a turn of events Karam becomes Pooja which creates further chaos in his already chaotic life.

Title: Kennedy
Plot: An insomniac ex-cop who dwells in different circumstances looking for redemption. The ex-cop, who is presumed dead for a long time, operates secretly for the corrupt system.

Title: Akelli
Plot: An ordinary Indian girl gets trapped in a war-torn land and survival is her battle.

Title: Friday Night Plan
Plot: When their mother takes off on a business trip, two bickering brothers unite to secretly attend the hottest party of the year before she returns.

Title: Jawan
Plot: A prison warden recruits inmates to commit outrageous crimes that shed light on corruption and injustice - and that lead him to an unexpected reunion.

Title: Haddi
Plot: In this ZEE5 Original film, a transgender, Haddi moves to Delhi and joins a gang of transgenders and cross-dressers headed by an influential man. But is this move aspirational or driven by revenge?

Title: Jaane Jaan
Plot: A single mother and her daughter commit a crime and a neighbor helps them cover it up amid the police investigation.

Plot: Ved Vyas Tripathi, aka Bhajan Kumar, is a devout Hindu man who faces an identity crisis and a personal dilemma when he discovers he is actually a Muslim by birth.

Title: Sukhee
Plot: Much to the dismay of her husband, a middle-class housewife, known for her rebellious attitude in high school, decides to attend her class reunion.

Title: Fukrey 3
Plot: The friends facing disastrously funny situations together and having each other's backs through the trenches to make it out of a new mess this time.

Title: Khufiya

Title: Mission Raniganj
Plot: When a flood leaves dozens of workers trapped in a coal mine, an engineer embarks on a daring rescue mission to save them. Inspired by real events.

Title: Dhak Dhak
Plot: Four women, who set out for a road trip to the highest motorable pass in the world on their bikes on a journey of self-discovery.
actors: Ratna Pathak Shah+Fatima Sana Shaikh+Dia Mirza

Title: Guthlee Ladoo
Plot: Guthlee, son of a poor sweeper, has a dream - to go to school. But the obstacle is his caste. A headmaster is sympathetic to him but powerless against caste discrimination. When they develop an unspoken bond, Guthlee's dream sees hope.

Title: Bhagwan Bharose
Plot: Two young, impressionable kids whose ideas about faith are constantly questioned and changed as their little world expands and takes into its fold, their country's fast-changing socio-political landscape.

Title: Ganapath
Plot: In a dystopian future, Ganapath, a relentless and skilled vigilante, embarks on a mission to dismantle a powerful criminal empire that has gripped the city in fear, Ganapath becomes a symbol of hope for the oppressed in which leads dark.

Title: Yaariyan 2
Plot: After moving to Mumbai, three cousins experience difficulties in their romantic relationships.

Title: Sajini Shinde Ka Viral Video
Plot: When a school teacher goes missing after a risqué video of her is posted on the internet, a police officer is tasked with uncovering the truth behind her disappearance.

Title: Tejas

Plot: The real-life story of IPS Officer Manoj Kumar Sharma and IRS Officer Shraddha Joshi.

Plot: At an anniversary party, Sohrab Handa is found dead, with his throat slit in the hall. As the investigation unravels, friendships are tested and secrets are revealed

Title: Shinigami's Box: Origins
Plot: In a race against time, Inspector Kabir of Special Crimes Unit must unravel the connection between a masked criminal captured during a critical operation and a mystifying box that materializes in a secluded village on the city's outskirts.

Title: The Ladykiller
Plot: When a small-town playboy falls in love for a dangerous girl, they embark on a journey of a dangerous romance.

Title: Three of Us
Plot: A delicate thread of emotions about love, loss, healing, awareness and liberation.

Title: Aankh Micholi
Plot: A family of misfits is trying to hide some secrets from the NRI suitor and his family as they want their daughter to get married to a well-to-do NRI guy. Then a series of comical twists and turns.

Title: UT69
Plot: Based on the true story of Businessman Raj Kundra's 63 days inside India's most over crowded jail, Arthur Road jail.

Title: Pippa
Plot: A young Indian Army captain from the 45 Cavalry regiment commanding the amphibious PT-76 war tank comes of age as he and his two siblings fight to liberate Bangladesh in the Indo-Pakistani war of 1971.

Title: Tiger 3
Plot: Tiger and Zoya are back - to save the country and their family. This time it's personal.

Title: Apurva
Plot: Apurva, a female protagonist, outwits an infamous gang of Chambal dacoits.

Title: The Face of the Faceless

The movie explores the journey of an individual seeking spiritual enlightenment, in line with the Brahma Kumaris' teachings of meditation and higher consciousness. The transformative power of light is symbolized, representing spiritual wisdom and clarity.

Plot: A man starts a lucrative business with his uncle when they realise he has a special power in this romantic comedy.

Title: Sanduk
Plot: Two twin soldiers (played by Sharib Hashmi), who have deserted the war, take refuge in an abandoned mansion. They hear a knock at the door along with a cry for help, sparking a disagreement about whether to answer it. The more dominant soldier (Soldier 1) decides that they will only let the person in if he can solve a riddle.

Title: Ghich Pich
Plot: A coming-of-age story about middle-class Indian fathers and their relationships with their sons - entangled in rebellion, insecurities and bound by tradition. Set in '90s Chandigarh.

Title: Krishna Arjun
Plot: Hemwant Tiwari's second SINGLE SHOT film KRISHNA ARJUN. Krishna is returning to the village after several years to set things right unaware of the fact that his naive twin brother ARJUN is being set in a trap by the local minister.

Title: Sikandar
Plot: A fiery youth confronts a powerful network of corruption, challenging the status quo and fighting for the common people's rights in a nation gripped by injustice.

Title: Mahavatar Narsimha
Plot: The demon Hiranyakashyap seeks revenge on Vishnu and declares himself a god. His son Prahlad remains devoted to Vishnu. Vishnu manifests as Narsimha to defeat the demon and restore balance.

Title: Kaafir
Plot: Follows Kainaaz Akhtar, a Pakistani woman falsely imprisoned as a militant. Journalist Vedant discovers her and her daughter, who was born in prison. Motivated by a strong sense of justice, he embarks on a mission to uncover the truth.

Title: Meroon: Ek Rishta Pyaar Ka
Plot: Seema loses her husband at a young age, faces discrimination, and finds a new life partner.

Title: Cycle Mahesh
Plot: A young worker's epic bicycle journey home and cinema's cold gaze

Title: Diler
actors: Ibrahim Ali Khan+Sammy Jonas Heaney+Natalia Janoszek

Title: Jaat
Plot: A fictional town plagued by injustice and brutality, Bharathi remarks that even God fears to set foot in this Lanka. Entering a land overrun with black money and corpses, Jaat arrives with intent to restore justice and save the villagers.

Title: Chhorii 2
Plot: Sakshi must rescue her seven-year-old daughter from a superstitious cult while fighting societal malpractices and the horror that continues to haunt her and young women around her.

Title: Aankhen 2
Plot: Aankhen 2 is based on a disgraced banker who hires three blind men for a heist. Whilst, the basic plot of the movie is same as its prequel, this time the heist is centered on a casino.

Title: Logout
Plot: Set in Delhi, LOGOUT follows 26-year-old Pratyush, a social media influencer on the brink of reaching 10 million followers. However, his ambitions take a terrifying turn when an obsessive fan gains access to his all-important phone.

Title: Ground Zero
Plot: After the 2001 Parliament attack, BSF officer Dubey leads a 2-year probe uncovering the mastermind Ghazi Baba, enabling India's biggest anti-terror operation.

Title: Oye Bhootni Ke
Plot: Rivalry between Broker and the Owner of Haunted Hermitage in outskirt of city traps, fun loving fake Ghost Exorcist Trio to put their life on stake against Ghost mob Inside and Goon Horde outside the Hermitage.

Title: The Bhootnii
Plot: Based in the heart of St. Vincent College, the Virgin Tree is home to a spirit who awakens every Valentine's Day in response to the longing for true love. This spirit is known to take souls away on Holika Dahan. For the first time, Baba witnesses a phenomenon that challenges everything he thought he knew about the spirit realm.

Title: Costao
Plot: The story of the civil servant who worked unafraid to fix the system's failures

Title: Humans in the Loop
Plot: Nehma, an Adivasi woman from the Oraon tribe, returns to her ancestral village with her children, Dhaanu (12) and Guntu (1), after her divorce. She begins work as a 'data labeller,' training AI models to recognise objects in images and videos. Finding AI childlike in its learning process, she imagines it seeing the world through her eyes, a connection she longs for with Dhaanu. Even as Nehma faces the challenge of giving Dhaanu-forever tempted to flee back to the city-a reason to stay, she notices AI adopting harmful human biases, some echoing prejudices against her community. Ultimately, Nehma realises she's battling not just for Dhaanu's future but for how technology and the world see people like her.

Title: Bhool Chuk Maaf
Plot: Ranjan, a small-town romantic boy from Banaras, lands a government job to marry Titli but forgets his vow to Lord Shiva-only to be trapped until he fulfills his promise. A hilarious tale of love, fate, and redemption unfolds.

Title: The Fable
Plot: Dev owns orchards and lives on a sprawling estate. After finding burnt trees Dev monitors workers and Nomads fall under suspicion. Despite night guards, a huge fire engulfs the mountainside. Dev uses violence in his search.

Title: Suswagatam Khushamadeed
Plot: "Suswagatam Khushamadeed" intends to spread a message of love, friendship and compassion elements that glue a society together. The film will fulfil the much required love , support and humour in this dark times.

Title: Kesari Veer
Plot: The movie narrates the tale of Hamirji Gohil, a brave warrior who fought against the Tughlaq Empire to protect the Somnath Temple and the Hindu faith.

Title: Jai Devaa
Plot: Love triangle of a violent lover.

Title: Maalik
Plot: Maalik is a gangster drama starring Rajkummar Rao that is expected to be a gripping story about a man's rise to power in the underworld. The film is based on social issues and is expected to be full of action and adventure.

Title: Shootout at Byculla
Plot: It would be Based On JJ Hospital Shootout Story in 1992. Arun Gawli Gang Killed Haseena parkar's husband And later how Dawood Ibrahim gang took avenge from Gawli Gang.

Title: Gyanvapi Files: A Tailor's Murder Story
Plot: The film based on murder of Kanhaiya Lal Sahu.

Title: Metro.... In Dino
Plot: Follows stories of bittersweet relationships in a contemporary setting, exploring various aspects, hues, and moods of love.

Title: Afra Tafri
Plot: Thiru's sent his wife an abusive video message under the influence of alcohol and so, now his marriage is on the verge of collapse. Hilarity ensues as Thiru tries to somehow salvage the situation.

Title: The Umesh Chronicles
Plot: The coming of age of a young girl, Radha in 1980s middle-class India. Surrounded by books and music, Radha has little contact with Sundar, a boy who helps her lead a life of privilege.

Title: War 2
Plot: Major Kabir Dhaliwal returns to combat a new threat to the nation in a perilous undercover mission.
actors: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.+Hrithik Roshan+Kiara Advani

Title: Run Bhola Run
Plot: This is a story of two criminals who have just escaped from jail and are now on the run.

Title: Hai Jawani Toh Ishq Hona Hai
Aashiqui 3
Plot: Plot unknown.

Title: Thama
Plot: A well-known and determined historian, he examines ancient manuscripts for clues to the mysterious vampire legends of Vijay Nagar.

Title: Golmaal 5
Plot: A group of childhood friends, gets caught in a puzzled up situation together, as they have a knack for it.

Title: De De Pyaar De 2
Plot: Follows the concerns of Ayesha's family in response to her romance with a 50-year-old.

Title: Alpha
Plot: Two fierce female agents tackle dangerous missions in a thrilling world of espionage, as they navigate perilous situations, execute daring stunts, and face unexpected turns in this action-packed adventure.

Title: Sanam Teri Kasam 2
Plot: Plot Unknown.

Title: Bhooth Bangla
Plot: Bhooth Bangla is an upcoming horror-comedy film starring Akshay Kumar, directed by Priyadarshan.

Title: 120 Bahadur
Plot: Recounting the legendary Battle of Rezang La during the Indo-China war, this film portrays the extraordinary valor and sacrifice of Indian soldiers against overwhelming odds.

Title: Aabra Ka Daabra
Plot: After a magician disappears during a trick, his son and a friend enroll at a magical school run by a power-hungry sorceress seeking eternal youth and world domination. They uncover dark secrets about the school's past.

Title: Ajey: The Untold Story of a Yogi
Plot: Ajey: The Untold Story of a Yogi follows the journey of Ajay Singh Bisht, who becomes Yogi Adityanath-a Hindu monk and a powerful political leader.

Title: Andaz
Plot: Dilip loves Neena, but she treats him only as a friend. Later she gets married to Rajan. When he comes to know that Dilip once loved Neena, he misunderstands them and things change a lot then.

Title: Ashwatthama - The Saga Continues
Plot: Immortal Warrior Ashwatthama from the Mahabharata, believed to exist in modern times, confronts adversaries in a high-octane action narrative set in an era of rapid technological advancements.

Title: Awara Pagal Deewana 2
Plot: After faking his death, former killer-for-hire Guru Gulab Khatri retires to Maldives with his new wife, Tina, while his ex-wife, Preeti, settles down in California with Anmol. The peaceful lives of both couples are interrupted by a mafia.

Title: Backfire
actors: Sandeepa Dhar+Karan Singh Grover+Kay Kay Menon

Title: Baghavat
Plot: The region under Maharaj Singh's control is under-going drought and famine-like conditions, and the Maharaj orders that the treasury be made open so that his public does not suffer. His orders are not followed by his Senapati, Dhurjan Singh, and Mahamantri. When Singh finds out and confronts them, they kill him. They send their men after the Maharani and the Rajkumar, Amar Singh, however, Sher Khan helps them to escape. They hide Amar in Bhagwan Shri Ganesh's temple, and a poor gypsy couple find and adopt him. In the meantime Sher Khan and a devastated Maharani start organizing a rebellion amongst the people. They gather together an army and start training them. Dhurjan passes away and he leaves behind a son, Vikram, and a daughter, Padmavati. Vikram assumes the throne and he is even more cruel than his dad. In the meantime, Amar has also grown up, has fallen in love with Padmavati and would like to marry her. His foster mother has a secret to share with him, but before that could happen, Amar is captured by Vikram's men, held and tortured in a prison cell, and finally he must meet his death when he is to be trampled by the feet of an elephant.

Title: Baiju Bawra
Plot: This is a story revolving around two singers.

Title: Balakot: The True Story
Plot: Film on Balakot air strikes 2019.

Title: Balidaan
Plot: A modern-day Robin Hood, Raja and his gang rob the wealthy to help the poor, becoming a headache for police. As he falls for Sheela, Inspector Ramesh Singh is assigned to capture the notorious gang.

Title: Bedhadak
Plot: Romantic triangular LoveStory of 3 characters Karan, Angad and Nimrit,, which gives amazing drama and emotions..!.

Title: Beej
Plot: Somewhere in a small village of Uttar Pradesh, a young girl named Ela gets possessed by a ghost. Gyanu, her father, brings an expert exorcist Omkar to expel it. In the process, they get to know that the ghost is not a random one, but someone who is related to daughter and father. Soon Omkar finds that Ela and Gyanu are in an incestuous relationship, and that ghost is also connected to that act of taboo. The ghost is impossible to be banished as it is bound to keep Ela and Gyanu in their forbidden bond to fulfil the journey of karma. On the other hand, Omkar has to find a solution to save Ela as she is on the edge of death.

Title: Be-Imaan
Plot: A man becomes a notorious thief after abandoning his fiancée. When he saves a girl from thugs, her grateful father adopts him, unaware of his true identity. His past resurfaces when two police officers face moral dilemmas.

Title: Black Currency: The Fake Currency Truth Unfolds
Plot: Raw Agent Arjun Singh hires a gangster John Thomas to work for him as a undercover agent to explode wide spread network of Indian fake currency which is pumped in by international gangsters. The Series with its crisp and entertaining story line with great awareness about the economic terrorism prevalent in India, because of counterfeit currency and also suggest and calls for measures to curb the these activities and to help stabilize the economy of the country.

Title: Caravan
Plot: Sunita is a young woman who ends up married to the wrong man, Rajan. Thinking that he has conspired with his girlfriend, Monica to murder her, she runs away to find an old friend of her father's in Bangalore who may be able to help. Having no money, the only way she can get there is to join a traveling caravan. The crew of the caravan is Mohan, Mohan's sidekick Johnny, and Mohan's younger brother Monto. Along the way, the caravan crosses paths with a group of gypsies that includes some causal young men. Sunita soon falls in love with Mohan but Nisha is attracted to Mohan and this puts Sunita in danger again to make matters worse Rajan has conducted a manhunt to find Sunita either by hook or by crook.

Title: Chakda 'Xpress
Plot: It is inspired by the journey of Jhulan Goswami as she moves up the ladder despite the problems created by misogynistic politics to fulfill her dream of playing cricket for India

Title: Chhatrapati Shivaji
Plot: This film chronicles key events in the life of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, founder of the Maratha Empire from his birth to his Coronation as "Chhatrapati"

Title: Chhota Bheem aur Krishna: Mayanagari
Plot: After Krishna stops Maayandri from releasing her brother, Kirmada, Maayandri decides to exact revenge on him. Later, Bheem and his friends set out to rescue Krishna and defeat Maayandri.

Title: Cuttputlli
Plot: When a small town gets plunged into the nightmare of serial killings, rookie cop Arjan embarks on a chase for the truth and unravels a gruesome conspiracy.

Title: Dacoit: A Love Story
Plot: Follows an angry convict seeking vengeance against his former girlfriend who betrayed him.

Title: Deewaar
Plot: Vijay struggles as a dockworker and eventually becomes a leading figure of the underworld, while his younger brother Ravi is an educated, upright policeman. This divide causes problems in their relationship.

Title: Deha
Plot: Sandhya Joshi's mom had wanted her daughter to study, at least complete her graduation in Commerce, before getting married. Her husband, however, thought otherwise and before Sandhya could complete her education, he got her married to Madhav Desai, the first ever man to enter Sandhya's life. The marriage takes place and Sandhya moves in with Madhav and his mom. Madhav makes it clear that he wants a child from her, however, years roll by without the couple conceiving. The second man to enter Sandhya's life is Lakshman, who she hires to do the cooking and housekeeping. The third man is Anirban H. Pandopadhyay, a violinist, who lives in a rented apartment. Sandhya does not know that soon she will be arrested by the police for killing one of the three men in her life. Watch as events unfold to see who was killed and what possessed Sandhya to kill him.

Title: Devi Aur Hero
Plot: A sex trafficking survivor seeks therapy for mysterious blackouts, meeting a therapist battling sex addiction. Both must overcome their psychological struggles before their inner darkness consumes them.

Title: Dhadak 2
Plot: The plot is currently under wraps.

Title: Do Ankhen Barah Haath
Plot: Progressive, reform-minded young warden gets permission to take six surly murderers from prison to dilapidated country farm, to rehabilitate it and themselves through hard work and kindly guidance.

Title: Do Badan
Plot: Vikas comes from a poor family, and is attending college so that he can complete his studies, get a job, and financially look after himself and his dad. He meets with wealthy Asha at this college, and after a few misunderstandings, both fall in love. Vikas' dad passes during the exams, and Vikas leaves to attend the funeral, and is unable to complete his studies. Asha feels sorry for him, and arranges to get him employed with her dad, which he does so, not knowing that his employer is Asha's dad. Asha's dad wants her to get married to Ashwini, and he soon announces their engagement. Ashwini finds out that Asha is in love with Vikas, and arranges an accident for Vikas. Vikas survives the accident, but loses his eyesight. After this incident, Vikas does not want to burden himself on Asha, and strikes up a new friendship with Dr. Anjali. Meanwhile, Ashwini informs Asha that Vikas has passed away in the accident, and Asha reluctantly marries Ashwini. The question remains, will those Vikas and Asha be able to meet during their lifetimes?

Title: Dus
Plot: Terrorist Mast Gul blows up Kashmir's Charar E Shariff mosque; Indian Army General sends undercover Captains Raja Sethi and Jeet Sharma to capture him and aide Nasheman from Afghanistan.

Title: Gandhari
Plot: Follows a mother's relentless pursuit to find and rescue her kidnapped daughter, exploring themes of revenge and redemption amidst her harrowing journey.

Title: Gandhi Talks
Plot: Unemployed Mahadev tries everything to find a job but fails repeatedly. Meeting wealthy Businessman Boseman, whose business empire nears collapse, Mahadev hatches a plan that might change his life.

Title: Ghulam-E-Musthafa
Plot: A gangster shuns the path of crime after his lover is killed by his rivals but soon he is dragged by his boss once again in the criminal world to do one last job.

Title: Gorkha
Plot: The film is based on the life of Major General Ian Cardozo, a veteran officer of the Gorkha regiment of the Indian Army (5th Gorkha Rifles).

Title: Grahasti
Plot: Harish, an auto factory owner, commutes between Delhi and Meerut, where his wife Maya, 8 kids, widowed sister Jamna, and her son Jaggu reside. The family rejoices when Harish visits on weekends.

Title: Gunaah
Plot: In Goa, India, the body of a young man is rescued by fishermen, who is then nursed to consciousness by Dr. Joe D'Costa albeit with a memory loss. Five years later he manages to regain his memory, when he came into contact with someone from his past. He now remembers that he is Ravi Sohni, a Journalist, whose task was to expose a politician by the name of Mahinder Singh. He does so resulting in the death of Mahinder only to later on find out that Mahinder was not a corrupt politician but he was being used as a pawn to bring him down. Ravi then sets off to correct the wrong done by him only to find out that he just devastate the life of the woman he loved - Kavita, who happens to be the daughter of Mahinder. He gets the shock of a life-time when he came into contact with Kavita as she not only hate him but is now marry to Dr. Ashok Khanna - who is serving time for murder in prison, and may be sentenced to death soon. Ravi then attempts to re-open a trial that had been cold for 5 years and to punish the person(s) responsible for up-turning his life.

Title: Haqeeqat
Plot: A platoon of Indian soldiers encounters harsh realities while fighting in the Sino-Indian War of 1962.

Title: Hari Singh Nalwa - Champion of the Khalsa Ji
Hera Pheri 3
Plot: In the highly anticipated third installment of the beloved Hera Pheri franchise, Raju, Shyam, and Baburao find themselves entangled in a hilarious yet perilous adventure involving a hidden treasure, mistaken identities, and criminology.

Title: Ikkis
Plot: Set against the backdrop of the 1971 war, follows the life of second Lieutenant Arun Khetrapal.

Title: I'm Not an Actor
Plot: A struggling Mumbai actor connects with a melancholic retired banker in Frankfurt through virtual acting lessons, bridging cultural gaps and personal struggles across continents.

Title: Inverse
Plot: In this story, time moves ahead of time, behind time, and simultaneously with time.And in this a lover is embroiled as he tries to find out the murderer of his girlfriend. At the same time, he is vulnerable to the ever-changing influence.

Title: Itihaas
Plot: Wealthy, powerful, and influential Thakur Digvijay Singh and beautiful Naina are bethrothed and are to be married soon. But Naina has fallen in love with the son, Karan, of Thakur's employee, Balwant. When Thakur finds out about this, he instructs his men to bring in Naina alive, and Karan dead. Karan and Naina run from this community all the way to Bombay. The Thakur announces a hefty reward, and soon bounty hunters are all over Bombay looking for the hapless couple. When Balwant hears about this, he too goes to Bombay, and does locate Karan and Naina. Karan is relieved to see his dad, but his relief soon turns to disbelief, as Balwant instructs him to let go of Naina, as he himself has come as an agent of the Thakur, not as his father.

Title: Jee Le Zaraa
Plot: Revolving around a road-trip taken by the three female protagonists.

Title: Jeete Hain Shaan Se
Plot: Johny, Govinda, and Iqbal Ali are three close friends who live in a small community in Bombay. The threesome get together to help each other and other needy people in the community, and hence get in the bad books of a local gangster who calls himself DK. Tragedy strikes Govinda, when his mom passes away. At the time of the funeral, Govinda is re-united with his dad, Advocate Verma, who has been missing for years. Then a police inspector gets Johny to meet his biological mother, Mary. The three friends rejoice over this good fortune. Then Johny finds out that Advocate Verma was behind the atrocities that were inflicted on his mom years ago, and he goes there to confront Verma, only to come against an enraged Govinda, who cannot believe his father is capable of committing any atrocities against anyone. It is now up to Iqbal to find a solution to end the enmity between Govinda and Johny, before DK takes advantage of this situation.

Title: Jumbo
Plot: Since childhood Jumbo (Jaidev) is taunted by other Elephants about his father being a coward. Jumbo decides leaves his house to find his father who was a war Elephant. But on the way he is captured by raiding party but escapes with help of prince. Years later in a village where Elephants and Humans live together villagers rebel against a tax collector and defeat him. The king of Elephants then calls the other Elephants to his palace where Jumbo's mother Devi recognizes him. The king also notices Jumbo from his childhood and keeps him as his personal war Elephant. Jumbo during a war comes across a giant and evil Elephant Bhaktawar and finds he was also responsible for his fathers death and wants to seeks revenge.

Title: Kalyug Aur Ramayan
Plot: Bhagwan Shri Ram would like his param-bhakt (Chief Devotee) Shri Hanuman to tour Kalyugic (Dark-aged) Hindustan, and himself witness the regression that has taken over this once peaceful, orderly, and religious country. Upon arrival in his present heavenly form, Shri Hanuman is mistaken by Police Inspector Thakur Hanuman Singh, to be a spy from a foreign country, and he gets on the run until Shri Ram changes his appearance to a wealthy man named Pavan Kumar, thus making him elude the police. Pavan meets with a man named Dashrath, who has two sons Raman and Dhaman. While Raman is married to Sarita, Dhaman is currently wooing Nirmala, and Dashrath's wife is the fashionable Kamla, who looks more like Dashrath's daughter. Things are not well in this family, as Kamla would like her ailing mother-in-law to turn over the family jewels, deities, and diamonds in her care - in vain though. So she maliciously gets Dashrath to sign over his entire estate in her name - leaving him penniless. Pavan attempts to set things right for this family, but greed, avarice, and lust have already overcome them to such an extent that he must use his heavenly powers to control them. Shri Ram, who feels that Pavan should not have used his powers to change the course of events, has his powers taken away, leaving him a mere mortal at the mercy of Kamla, Sarita, Raman, Dhaman, and a notorious smuggler Bhairo Singh - who is none other than the reincarnation of Lord Ravan himself.

Title: Kanch Ki Gudiya
Plot: After her mother's death, young Shukla finds shelter with a wealthy woman. When faced with potential exploitation, she shows remarkable courage in maintaining her dignity despite life's cruel twists.

Title: Kati Patang
Plot: A runaway bride promises her dying widowed friend that she will assume her identity and look after her infant child.

Title: Kaun Kare Kurbanie
Plot: After his transfer from Delhi, Inspector Arjun Singh lives in Bombay along with his wife, Anita, school-going son, Munna; and a younger collegian brother, Ajit. Arjun is disappointed with Ajit as he spends most of his time singing, dancing and flirting with girls. Then a series of sexual molestations and killings of attractive bikini-clad young women take place, and Arjun is assigned to this case. After a short period of time, his investigations lead him to a wealthy suspect, but when the suspect's daughter is molested and killed, his department gets evidence that may implicate another suspect - none other than Ajit.

Title: Koochie Koochie Hota Hai
Plot: The film is an animated take on Kuch Kuch Hota Hai, and it marks the 20 year anniversary of its release.

Title: Love Driver
Plot: This is a Love Story. The story of a Taxi Driver (Love) and a Beautiful Passenger (Priya)

Title: Maa Kaali
Plot: The tragic events of August 16, 1946 - one of the darkest chapters in the history of Bengal. The communal violence that erupted on that day that deeply affected the lives of countless people of the region.

Title: Mandi
Plot: Forbidden love, fraying loyalties and flagrant hypocrisy emerge when sanctimonious politicians drive a madam's brothel from the heart of Hyderabad.

Title: Manthan
Plot: A young veterinary surgeon, Dr. Rao, who makes a visit to a village, where he intends to commence a co-operative society dairy for the betterment of the rural people.

Title: Mera Gaon Mera Desh
Plot: When Ajit, a former prisoner, learns of Jabbar who is terrorising the people of his village, he decides to stand up against him. However, things take a turn when Jabbar abducts Ajit's lover.

Title: Mrigayaa
Plot: In the 1930s, a group of tribals live in a small village in a forest in Odisha. A British administrator arrives at the village who is passionate about hunting. He befriends Ghinua, an exceptional archer.

Title: Mr Lele
Plot: A Marathi NRI takes ecstasy at a night club and in 48 hours he ends up in jail.

Title: Mr. & Mrs. '55
Plot: A young woman must be married to claim her inheritance; her misandrist aunt uses the newly-passed 1955 divorce bill to find her a temporary husband.

Title: Nachaniya
Plot: Based On a True Life Incident In Chappra(Bihar) Watch The Twists and Turns In The Lives Of three Friends Who Plot To Become Rich Overnight. Whilst the Hottest Item In Town Rasili Sets Her Eyes On The Prize Thats Beyond Reach While Avenging The Societal Abuse She Encountered In Her Career Path. Director Sujoy Mukerji Brings Together A Package Of Total Entertainment. A Film Which Is All About Love, Planning And Plotting,Game,Romance and Revenge.

Title: Pehchan
Plot: Bombay-based Barkha lives a wealthy lifestyle with her widowed mom and brother, Rakesh, who is to marry a wealthy woman by the name of Maya. Barkha meets with a naive man from Vishnupur by the name of Gangaram who has come to Bombay to get married. His marriage was arranged with Duriya Choudhry's daughter, but Choudhry decided to get his daughter married elsewhere after he finds out that Gangaram does not know English, is unemployed, and has virtually no future prospects. Barkha and Gangaram are attracted to each other, so much so that he introduces her to his sister, Champa, and an ex-firefighter who they live with. Barkha and Gangaram come even closer after she finds out that the ex-firefighter had actually saved her life when their house had caught fire. When Barkha's brother and mom come to know that she wants to marry Gangaram they are enraged and refuse to accept him as their in-law. But when Barkha persuades them, they relent, and Rakesh goes to Gangaram's house to discuss marriage. He does not discuss marriage or anything at all, but angrily returns home and informs his mom and sister that Gangaram is living with a dancer from a local brothel - the very woman that Gangaram had introduced to Barkha as his sister. A visibly upset Barkha goes to confront Gangaram and asks him disown Champa, when he refuses to do so, she asks him to chose between her and Champa. The question remains what will be Gangaram's choice?

Title: Perversion
Plot: Perversion is story of Family where every member has different perversions.

Title: Pinch
Plot: "Pinch" is a dark comedy set during Navratri in India, where travel blogger Maitri Singh clashes with her mother, avoids a creepy landlord, and accidentally triggers a mob.

Title: Pooja Meri Jaan
Plot: A girl named Pooja is being stalked by an unidentified admirer of her.

Title: Pran Jaye Par Vachan Na Jaye
Plot: Rural outlaw Raja protects villagers from corruption until his attraction to dancer Janiya complicates her life. When rivals kidnap her, he must venture beyond his territory on a perilous rescue mission.

Title: Punjab '95
Plot: Based on the life of prominent human rights activist jaswant singh kalra.

Title: Raja
Plot: Raja and Madhu fall in love and decide to get married. However, her brothers are against the alliance and devise a plan to drive the two apart.

Title: Ricky
Plot: A young man's struggle with his fragmented family and society.

Title: Rosie: The Saffron Chapter
Plot: A film based on true events in Gurugram.

Title: Safar
Plot: It follows Sunny Deol and a child artist, both facing personal struggles, their lives intertwined in an uplifting celebration of human resilience.

Title: Sanyasi
Plot: Ram, raised by his widowed mother, rejects marriage. She transfers the family estate to cousin Rakesh, who's fallen for Ram's intended bride Aarti, unleashing a web of deceit.

Title: Sarzameen
Plot: An Army officer will stop at nothing to free Kashmir valley from terrorism, even if it means paying a terrible price.

Title: Section 108
Plot: Shikha Saxena represents Sunrise Insurance seeks help from lawyer Tahoor Khan. She present him with the case of a missionary billionaire who is going to declared dead and then her company will have to pay a huge sum of money.

Title: Sitaare Zameen Par
Plot: It is based on the Spanish film, Champions (2018). It stars Aamir Khan and Genelia D'Souza. The film was announced in October 2023. Principal photography took place in India over four months.

Title: SOS: Secrets of Sex
Plot: Prachi becomes pregnant and she and her boyfriend are trying to solve the matter by the way of abortion.

Title: Spider
Plot: Mithu, a sharp and determined detective, is locked in a deadly game with "The Spider," a shadowy criminal mastermind weaving a web of corruption throughout the city.

Title: Tahalka
Plot: Dongrilla is controlled by General Dong who eyes on India.Major Krishnarao plans a mission to the region with few of his officers to stop Dong.In between the team realizes that the mission is patriotic as well as personal to Krishnarao.

Title: Takht
Plot: Vicky Kaushal plays Aurangzeb and Ranveer plays Dara, Aurangzeb's elder brother. It's the story about the enmity between brothers caused for the succession of the Throne.

Title: Tapa Tap
Plot: An unsatisfied husband decides to spice up his sex life by inviting another married couple for dinner where things take an unexpected turn.

Title: Taqdeer
Plot: For the well-being of her children, a destitute widow is forced to marry a man she dislikes.

Title: Tere Mere Beech Mein
Plot: The story of a happy-go lucky country bumpkin whose life takes a strange and hilarious turn when he suddenly inherits a fortune.

Title: The Battle of Bhima Koregaon
Plot: Follows the Battle of Bhima Koregaon which was fought on 1 January 1818 between the British East India Company and the Peshwa faction of the Maratha Confederacy, at Koregaon Bhima.

Title: The Bull
Plot: The terrible events of the terrorist attacks of November 3, 1988 in Malé, Maldives.

Title: The Death Sentence: Mrityu Dand
Plot: Three women are sentenced to Death as they dare to speak out and threaten to break the Status Quo of a male dominated society.

Title: The Garhwal Rifles
Plot: Garhwal Rifles is a well-known Regiment of the Indian Army. This Regiment Made in the Year of 1887, this regiment consists of 19 battalions with the strength of 25000 soldiers. During the World Wars and in which the wars fought after the Independence, this regiment not only showed their outstanding courage but also maintained regiments unique identity. Mainly from the Garhwali soldiers, this type of regiment fought with great confidence and showed their courageness during the Kargil Wars. More than 25,000 soldiers of this regiment are currently at present engaged in the task of safeguarding our motherland. That is all because of them only.

Title: The Immortal Ashwatthama
Plot: Follows Ashwatthama's journey as he seeks redemption and immortality.

Title: The Intern
Plot: Indian version of "The Intern": A retired widower finds new purpose when he joins a thriving online fashion company as their senior citizen intern, bringing his years of experience to a modern workplace.

Title: The Networker
Plot: After his MLM company fails, Aditya partners with networker Lallan and friend Raghav to launch new ventures backed by Pradhan. They hire a motivational speaker and fake MD before absconding to Dubai with investors' money.

Title: Thokar
Plot: After being released from jail, Shyamu returns home to his village and his home to his mom, and blind sister, Radha. Shyamu and his mom try to get Radha married, but in vain, as no one wants to marry blind woman. Shyamu takes Radha for treatment to Dr. Ashok, who assures them that her vision can be restored, and the cost is around Rs.5000/-. Shyamu come up with the money, and soon Radha gets her eyesight back. One day, Shyamu rescues a beautiful young woman, Seema, from being raped by Gangu, takes her home, nurses her, and falls head-over-heels in love with her. He hopes to marry her. His mother is thrilled and plans the marriage of both Shyamu and Radha. But there is a hitch in the plans. Seema loves another man - a man to whom Shyamu is indebted to for life. Will this man permit Shyamu to marry Seema?

Title: Toaster
Plot: Murder and chaos erupt when a miser becomes obsessed with a toaster he gave as a wedding gift.

Title: Upkar
Plot: Cult classic highlighting the contrast between Indian and Western values in the newly independent state.

Title: Wedding Celebration
Plot: The life of an impoverished male undergoes drastic changes after he gets his siblings married.

Title: Welcome to the Jungle
Plot: Police officers Jay Bakshi and Sandhya have been given task to track down notorious criminal Raj Solanki. Things take an unexpected turn when JaY finds out that Raj plays a significant role in his life.

Title: Woh Ladki Hai Kahaan
Plot: An investigative comedy where a lady cop and a groom starts looking for the bride.

Title: Yaadgaar
Plot: An honest and patriotic young man learns that politicians, and the wealthy, are not. Notable songs: "Jish path peh chala, us path peh mujhe pas to aane de, saathi na samaj, koi baat nahin, mujhe saath to aane deh..."; "Ik tara bhole, tun tun, kya kahey yeh tumse..."; :Baharon ka hai mela, hai mera dil akeyla..."; "Woh khet me milega, kalyan me milega, Bhagwan, toh eh bandhey, insaan me milega...".

Title: Yeh Hai Malegaon Ka Superman
Plot: A thin, awkward superman brings hope to Malegaon in this comedic parody that blends social commentary with playful jabs at Bollywood superhero conventions.
